title: Gradient Boosting Monotonic Constraints
description: This is a step-by-step tutorial to demonstrate the effect of monotonic constraints on a gradient boosting estimator. Gradient boosting is a popular machine learning technique used for regression and classification tasks. In this tutorial, we will build an artificial dataset and use a gradient boosting estimator to demonstrate the effect of monotonic constraints on the model's predictions.

meta.title: Gradient Boosting Monotonic Constraints Tutorial
meta.description: Step-by-step guide to demonstrate the effect of monotonic constraints on a gradient boosting estimator.
meta.keywords: machine learning, gradient boosting, monotonic constraints, classification, scikit-learn, scikit-learn playground, regression
